fields.name: Invincible Stonewall (C1)
fields.value: Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

fields.name: Rockcore Meltdown (C2)
fields.value: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

fields.name: Will of the Rock (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the level of Wake of Earth by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Reaction Force (C4)
fields.value: The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every enemy hit. A maximum of 25 Energy can be recovered in this manner.

fields.name: Meteorite Impact (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the level of Starfell Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Everlasting Boulder (C6)
fields.value: The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer. The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.
